entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Don't try to build TFMs that we know we can't build #41639
  • Failed to sign apphost error code 1 #41636
  • When running 'dotnet workload list' in cmd, the categories and their contents are not vertically aligned on JPN OS. #41622

Closed

  • Disappearing MAUI templates and dotnet new install Microsoft.Maui.Templates does not work #40599
    Discussion
  • dotnet run not working in docker container image: mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/sdk:8.0 #39017
  • Strange warning about android version #41444
  • Change Container environment variables to use DOTNET_ prefix #41637
  • [9.0-preview.4] Failed tests not reported to the console in CI on MacOS #41299

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix newline bug when updating exclusion baseline #41640
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • In BrowserScriptMiddleware, dispose GetManifestResourceStream() #41634
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add comments to resources to instruct loc team about 'fixed' portions of the strings #41631
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Adds metadata to JS initializers and JS modules #41629
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41624
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [StaticWebAssets] Always fingerprint initializers #41619
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Run the WinForms app test #40708
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement dotnet test help option #41142
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #41641
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • source-build: bundle NativeAOT libraries with the SDK. #41198
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers: insecure registries: allow https (ignore cert errors), and accept config from envvar. #41506
    untriaged, Area-Containers
